site.title: Free Online Resize Image to 20KB, 50KB - Quick Image Resizer
site.description: Quick image resize tool to easily compress images online to 50KB, 20KB or any specified size without affecting image quality. Supports single and batch processing, no registration or software download required, completely free.
site.name: QuickResizeImage

hero.title: Free Online Resize Image to 20KB, 50KB - Quick Image Resizer
hero.subtitle: Quick image resize tool to easily compress images online to 50KB, 20KB or any specified size without affecting image quality. Supports single and batch processing, no registration or software download required, completely free.
hero.howToTitle: How to Quickly Resize Image to 20KB or Compress Image to 50KB
hero.step1Description: Drag and drop your image or click to select. Supports JPG, PNG, WebP, HEIC, BMP, GIF formats.
hero.step2Description: Enter your desired KB size (20KB, 50KB, or any custom size up to 50MB). Default is 20KB.
hero.step3Description: Click "Resize Image" and download your high-quality processed result.

privacy.title: Complete Privacy Protection
privacy.description: All processing happens in your browser. Your images never leave your device.

batch.title: Batch Processing

formats.title: Universal Format Support

free.title: 100% Free Forever
free.description: No registration, no watermarks, no limits. Use our image resizer anytime.

q1.question: How do I compress image to 50KB without losing quality?
q1.answer: Our smart algorithm automatically adjusts resolution and compression ratio to maintain optimal quality while reaching your target 50KB size. You can also choose fixed resolution to ensure the image dimensions don't change, though this may reduce compression precision.

q2.question: Can I resize image to 20KB for different formats?
q2.answer: Absolutely! Our image resizer supports all major formats including JPG, PNG, WebP, HEIC, BMP, and GIF.

q3.question: Can I resize multiple images to 20KB at once?
q3.answer: Yes! Our tool supports batch upload. You can upload up to 10 images at once and resize them all with one click.

q4.question: Are there any limitations using this tool?
q4.answer: Our tool has no restrictions. You can use it as much as you need, completely free.

q5.question: Is this tool safe to use?
q5.answer: Absolutely safe! All image processing happens locally in your browser. Your images are never uploaded to our servers, ensuring complete privacy protection.

upload.title: Upload Image
upload.subtitle: Drag and drop an image here, or click to select
upload.supportedFormats: Supports JPG, PNG, WebP, HEIC, BMP, GIF (Max 50MB)
upload.batchUploadInfo: You can upload up to 10 images at a time

descriptions.autoResolution: Automatically adjusts image resolution to achieve target file size with optimal quality
descriptions.fixedResolution: Maintains specified dimensions while adjusting quality to approach target file size

errors.processingFailed: Image processing failed, please try again
errors.targetSizeRequired: Target size must be greater than 0KB
errors.targetSizeExceedsOriginal: Target size ({{targetKB}}KB) cannot exceed 2x the original size ({{originalKB}}KB)
errors.compressionFailed: Compression failed, unable to reach target size
errors.invalidKBValue: Please enter a valid KB value ({{min}}-{{max}})
errors.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported file format. Please select JPG, PNG, WebP, HEIC, BMP, or GIF files.
errors.tooManyImages: Cannot upload {{files}} images. Maximum {{max}} images allowed. You can upload {{allowed}} more images.
errors.invalidTargetSize: Please set a valid target size

processing.foundHighPrecision: Found high precision result, ending early
